sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>bamboo</radical> <radical>tsunami</radical> uses its <radical>drop</radical>s to carry out its <radical>specialty</radical>, which is turning itself into <kanji>record book</kanji>s.
meaningInfo: The bamboo tsunami hits the ground and drops of bamboo turn into sheets of paper. The sheets of paper combine to become record books that record what happened here, on this day.
readingMnemonic: A <kanji>record book</kanji> is a <reading>bo</reading>ok (<ja>ぼ</ja>), when it comes down to it.
readingInfo: Bamboo can also become <reading>bo</reading> staffs too, if they don't turn into record books.
